title: raka ult doesnt get assists anymore?
body: i used to play raka mid and use ult with mejais to get free stacks but as of late ults dont give assists, is this a bug or intentional? ive only played about 2 games with this happening?

replies.body: I'm currently getting assists as Soraka support when ulting, but sometimes its random. Kinda like the Janna Q bug that can sometimes go through people and not knock them up. I think there is one thing though... if you ult them and they are already at full health, I don't think you get an assist.
bug, only turned up this latest patch.
